column5: Well, after a lenghty search I finally found a used ATV in my price range and in mint condtion. Do any of you know of any spots to ride around the Barrie area? Yes, I'll be using the ATV mainly for icefishing, but I'd like to just get out and ride once in a while on a trail. Feel free to PM if you don't want to post here.  Cheers, Colin  [emailÂ protected]
Just a small heads up if you're interested, there's a Mike Holmes charity ride next weekend in Borden, I'm not associated with it, just for your info.
Thanks for the heads up...I'll look into it!
I have no idea about the Barrie area, but the ganaraska forest has about 9000 acres of trails open for public use. Its $25/day/rider. You can ride all day long, and not pass the same trail twice.  S.
